website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Alpha 58 (SLT-A58K) offers an upgraded OLED EVF and kit lens, but it isn't the top D-SLR in Sony's lineup.
pros: Good performance at high ISO settings
cons: EVF not as sharp as other Sony models
Rear LCD could be larger and sharper

customer_reviews.title: I like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: I'm an interested amateur when it comes to photography. Consequently I was not prepared to spend thousands on a camera and lenses. I wanted a camera I could have full control over with performance exceeding that of a good bridge camera. I added a Sony 300mm lens and am delighted with the results. It does more than I expected it would, picture quality exceeds my expectations also. I can't stop taking photographs and I need to delete very few of them. Photograph more edit less works for me.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: WOW CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera for the for the Post Compact / bridge camera experience. As it comes as a set this really covers all you will need to start your up grade to professional photography.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant camera very well made
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera very well made , and my A mount Minolta lenses also fit . Great price also, am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Tidy Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it out and was happy with the results. No problems with fitting or the results with other Minolta and Sigma lenses. If anything, and this is not a complaint, it is a bit too small for my hands. Never mind, I'll order another camera in the Alpha range that's a bit bigger from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great value small DSLR
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to move up to a DSLR from my bridge camera. Chose this one because my husband has a Sony and I can borrow some of his lenses. Also because of the size - for a DSLR its a very small camera but still with good features and 20MP.
customer_reviews.author: wandah

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: had this camera 8 months 14500 shutter actuations i have been busy very good picture quality good video simple to use very impessed now have got 45000 actuations still delivering excelent pics and video 4/3/2018 very good buy
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far very good results. Still learning all the possibilities (difficult to teach old dogs new tricks!)
customer_reviews.author: O.C. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Super camera
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Have yet to explore the many functions but I'm going to have lots of fun with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, took some amazing shots on trip to Cyprus. Worth the money, especially with the 2 lens pack :- ) Used to use a Nikon D7000 through work and to be honest, was too complicated. The pics with this on auto are as good, if not better than the Nikon for less than half the price!
customer_reviews.author: graham wilcock

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the acquisition
customer_reviews.text: Even though I am a beginner, I believe that this camera wil suits all my needs. I'm sure that it will be enough for me for long time. Very happy with the acquisition!
customer_reviews.author: Luiza Schwartz Dias

customer_reviews.title: Sony Alpha A58 Translucent Mirror Interchangeable Lens Camera with 18-55mm
customer_reviews.text: Sony Alpha A58 Translucent Mirror Interchangeable Lens Camera with 18-55mm takes great pictures and is very fast. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera very pleased and good value, came as Ex-Demonstration model but was in box with no signs of being unwraped with all paper work.
customer_reviews.author: benharvey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fix seems to be fine so far so good
customer_reviews.author: notting hill

customer_reviews.title: It replaced another Sony alpha with which I was very happy. Took a bit of getting used to but ...
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about buying this. It replaced another Sony alpha with which I was very happy. Took a bit of getting used to but it's a great camera for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first Sony I have ever owned. So far the experience has been perfect
customer_reviews.author: Zaman

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Like this product always works well for me. I know people criticise this but for me its great. Very efficient and very reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, takes beautiful pictures
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very fast camera. The colors of the pictures taken with this camera are very rich. Ideal camera for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: The 4th one from Sony Alpha series
customer_reviews.text: We have had Sony A100, A550, A55 and now A58 We have always been pleased with them and its a they are giving highest quality pictures
customer_reviews.author: Åke Ekenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great DLSR
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic DLSR with a wide range of lens including historic ones from Minolta, which both cheap and of a high quality. Produces very clear and detailed photographs at all focal lengths, including Macro and night bulb shots. The one thing to point out is that the flash fitting in different from earlier Sony Alpha or Minolta cameras which means that an adaptor is required to use flash guns made for these cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought this while on offer as all the tech site rate it well as an entry level camera. There are lots of feature most of which I am still learning how to use. I have bought this for a safari later this year and took it to German Libori festival to get used to it and it been really good and can already see the difference in pics just on auto modes. The only bad point is it seems to pic up dirt easily. So need a cleaning kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Saville

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: I chose this camera after weeks and weeks of research of other SLR.S in this category. It has a great build, takes excellent pics and a great upgrade from any compact. Read all the geek reviews and you won't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: James Denning

customer_reviews.title: Accept its limitations, and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.text: read and check any of the A58 limitations are good for you before purchase. I already had experience with SLT technology. It has no GPS and the LCD display only tilts in one direction. There is a very wide auto-bracketing range which is useful in difficult light especially if you know how to stitch them together using photoshop or lightroom, a much better solution than built in HDR. Pick a good lens and it will take truly excellent photos the way you want them with very little effort to learn its tricks. Not as many megapixels as some, but again if you know what you are doing you can take multiple 'panoramic' exposures and blend them together with photoshop.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: A good budget choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, my only gripe is that in low light the on screen image is as dark as the captured image would be without the use of the built-in flash (unless the built-in flash is open), I use an external flash to bounce light off the ceiling, so have to have the built-in flash open & covered with something if I want to see the screen. It would also be nice that in auto mode the user could set a maximum ISO setting as the camera seems to prefer going for high ISO rather than longer exposure times.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: The best for this price
customer_reviews.text: The camera is the best thing, which you can get for this price! it fits very well in the hand!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Friesen

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera but had no choice but return item as query over packaging, so product was not opened.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective in doing the job
customer_reviews.text: Have had this camera for a month or so now. Wanted to purchase it just before I went on holiday and as a beginner, I have to say I was incredibly impressed with the shots I was able to capture with this camera. It was easy to use, comfortable to hold and has an array of features - some of which I am yet to try out. The battery lasted with continuous use over a whole day. I am happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: I used the same model belonging to my friend on a SAL 18-135 and was really happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: It's my first DSLR. I used the same model belonging to my friend on a SAL 18-135 and was really happy with the quality. I got this one and used it with Tamron 18-200. Don't know if it's the cam that it faulty or the lens as the pictures are quite grainy.
customer_reviews.author: Abs

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with a lot of features
customer_reviews.text: Great camera with a lot of features. People who saw my photos asked me what camera do you have cause your photos are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Bajada

customer_reviews.title: I'll be in a better position to comment on or after
customer_reviews.text: Forwarded on to Santa. I'll be in a better position to comment on or after 25th
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is a Sony and that is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera in use now for 3 days and as an avid photographer I am positively surprised regarding the features and the ease of use both in manual and automatic settings. This is my 3rd Sony with interchangeable lenses and while the Alpha 100 was noisy and clumsy this A58 feels more like a camera for semi-pros and certainly a nice camera for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying using this camera keep trying different lens and settings really good clear photos. A really good starter camera as not used a digital slr.
customer_reviews.author: soo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work with, quick and precis, works fine with my older lenses
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with even with wery little experience of this type of camera. Quick start up, easy to do some of your own adjustment, needs not to much to lern.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hagstrãm

customer_reviews.title: Suits me!
customer_reviews.text: Although just a novice I found this easier to handle than the larger DSLR my husband had given me when he up graded. It's lighter and I have used it more in the short time I have had it than the other model I have had for months...! Just need to get to grips with all the different things it can do and be braver and take it off automatic. But so far, loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Melf

customer_reviews.title: Xmas present
customer_reviews.text: It arrived safe and sound and a lot quicker than I assumed it would, the item work really well and the recipient is very happy with the gift
customer_reviews.author: Josy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: sony alpha A58
customer_reviews.text: as I have used Minolta products for years and have been exceptionally please with them I am hoping that the Sony will be a a very good successor My only disappointment is I cant used my Minolta lenses with because of the A mount
customer_reviews.author: Austin Grime

customer_reviews.title: Sony Alpha 58.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I do advise everyone who's taking the first steps into photohgraphers life to buy the Sony Alpha 58. Why? Taking all the details out, the camera has a good price / perfomance ratio and is very easy to use. Now, things more specific ... This camera is one of the few on the market that shoots at 8 fps (when shooting in bright light environment). Also, the camera has Full HD Video recording and 20.1mpx. I think that there isn't many cameras at this price with 8fps shooting, Full HD Video recording, 20.1mpx , and other technical matters. That's all Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic camera
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use (for a beginner), great looking and takes amazing pictures. Great features too and a decent lens.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My Sony Alpha a58 dslr camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sony a58 dslr camera because i have three Minolta none digital cameras and these lens will fit the Sony a58.I very much like the camera it will take a bit of getting used to.It only took 3 days from ordering to me receiving it and was very well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

product_meta.title: SLT-A58K + DT 18-55 mm lens
product_meta.description: Sony SLT-A58K. Mégapixel: 20,1 MP, Type d'appareil photo: Kit d'appareil-photo SLR, Type de capteur: CMOS. Longueur focale: 18 - 55 mm, Nomnbe d'ouverture minimum: 3.5, Nombre maximum d'ouverture: 5.6. Modes Auto Focusing (AF): auto focus continu, auto focus individuel, Spot Auto Focus. Sensibilité ISO: 100, 200, 400, 16000, Type d'exposition: priorité d'ouverture AE, Auto, Manuel, priorité à la vitesse, Contrôle d'exposition à la lumière: Programme AE. Vitesse maximale d'obturation de la caméra: 1/4000s, Vitesse minimale d'obturation de la caméra: 30s, Type obturateur de la caméra: Électronique Prise de vue rapide et précise Profitez de chaque détail avec le capteur CMOS HD Exmor® APS: Avec une sensibilité de 100 à 16000 ISO et une résolution de 20,1 Mpx, le capteur vous permet de profiter de chaque détail, même par faible luminosité. Profitez d'une excellente réactivité: A l'inverse des appareils photo reflex numériques, la technologie de miroir semi-transparent n'implique pas de miroir mobile et offre donc une réactivité exceptionnelle. Composez des clichés en toute confiance: Le viseur OLED Tru-Finder™ à contrastes élevés affiche de façon fidèle les images telles qu'elles apparaîtront, en prenant en compte les réglages et les conditions d'exposition. Soyez prêt à tout avec un objectif zoom polyvalent: Du cliché grand angle 18 mm au cliché standard 55 mm, cet objectif zoom léger et compact est facile à utiliser. Verrouillage de la mise au point sur des sujets en déplacement rapide: Idéal pour les scènes de sport ou de nature, le système de mise au point automatique est doté d'une fonction de verrouillage de la mise au point sur les sujets en déplacement. Composez vos clichés comme un professionnel: La fonction de cadrage automatique détecte le sujet de vos
feature_bullets: Capteur CMOS HD Exmor® APS 20,1 Mpx, viseur OLED Tru-Finder™, 8 images/s, verrouillage de la mise au point automatique avec objectif zoom SAL1855-2

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars447 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
